description: This file is a Java class defining a REST controller for managing taxi booking operations in a backend service. It provides endpoints for creating, assigning drivers, starting, completing, canceling, and retrieving bookings, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and Swagger documentation.

classes.name: BookingController
classes.description: A REST controller handling HTTP requests related to taxi booking operations, with endpoints for creating, assigning drivers, starting, completing, canceling, and retrieving bookings.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new booking given a request body with booking details.

methods.name: assignDriver
methods.description: Assigns a driver to a booking and transitions its state to ASSIGNED.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts a ride, transitioning the booking state to IN_PROGRESS.

methods.name: complete
methods.description: Completes a ride, transitioning the booking to COMPLETED and marking the driver as available.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a booking if it is in REQUESTED or ASSIGNED state.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a booking by its ID.

methods.name: listByUser
methods.description: Lists all bookings associated with a specific user.

methods.name: listByDriver
methods.description: Lists all bookings associated with a specific driver.
